title: 01/11/2021 - HOUR 1 - Browns-Steelers, Lamar, Brady, Rams
itunes:title: 01/11/2021 - HOUR 1 - Browns-Steelers, Lamar, Brady, Rams
description:
It's time for the Steelers to move on from Big Ben or suffer the consequences

Lamar Jackson proved his doubters wrong

What the Browns win over the Steelers tells us

Tom Brady moving on to the next round

Jared Goff's contract is a problem for the Rams


Guest: Howie Long

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
